description: Comprehensive testing across all user flows, browsers, and performance scenarios

issues.title: Test all user authentication flows
issues.description: Comprehensive testing of all authentication flows: New User ("Get Started"), Legacy User with Linked Pubkey, Legacy User without Linked Pubkey, Existing Nostr User, Upload Attempt flow, and all error scenarios including network failures and invalid data.

issues.title: Cross-browser and device testing
issues.description: Test enhanced authentication across Chrome, Firefox, Safari on desktop and mobile browsers (iOS Safari, Android Chrome). Verify PWA functionality if applicable and test email client integrations with Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail.

issues.title: Performance testing for auth flows
issues.description: Measure authentication flow performance including time to complete each flow, testing with slow network conditions (3G simulation), bundle size optimization for new components, and concurrent user scenarios with rate limiting.
